participant_1.background:
I do my laundry every week, except for the Renaissance Faire outfit.
I do not wish to discuss my parents' death.
I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to.
I am proud of my ability to get a degree in two years despite my reputation as a slacker.
I love to eat healthy foods like fruits and vegetables, as well as whole grains and lean protein.

participant_2.background:
I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions.
i own a ford truck.
i have two pet dogs.
My family is really busy and we don't always have time to connect.
Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs.

content.text: What is your favorite thing about yourself?
I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions. I am proud of that.
That's awesome! What are your passions?
I love to paint and I love my dogs. I also like to work on my truck.
Those are some great passions! Are you a professional painter?
No, I'm not. I just paint for fun. I have a friend who is a professional painter, though.
That's really cool. Do you have any paintings of your dogs?
Yes, I do! I painted a portrait of my two small dogs last year. It's my favorite painting.
That's amazing! I would love to see it.
I can send you a picture of it.
That would be great!
I'll send it to you right now.
Thanks!
No problem!
Wow, that's a beautiful painting!
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
It's really realistic. Your dogs look so cute.
I'm glad you think so. I put a lot of time into it.
It shows. It's a really great painting.
Thanks
